product_name: Salomon Ivy Snowboard Boots - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The women's Salomon Ivy snowboard boots go on easy and offer a comfortable and secure fit for all-day, all-mountain fun in the snow. Lacing system offers fluid, single-pull tightening and secure lock-down for a natural flex and feel; zonal tightening offers a personalized fit. Medium forward flex and forgiving lateral movement enhance execution and stability on all types of terrain. Women-specific liner construction provides personalized support and solid heel hold for narrow heels; liners are custom moldable for extra comfort. Toasty Toes and all-around furry linings keep feet warm and comfortable on bitter-cold days. Preshaped footbeds provide foot stabilization and arch support for improved pressure distribution; antimicrobial finish helps deter odors. Women's low-profile anatomic sole design in the Salomon Ivy snowboard boots is lightweight and well damped for excellent transmission and cushioning. Closeout.
